PROFESSOR: OK, so
let's get started. I just wanted to
make one announcement

before we start the lecture. So Prof. Zwiebach is a way again today,
which is why I'm lecturing.

And his office hours he's

So today we're going to

about linear operators.

OK? So let's start with
